title: Shockproof [1949] Dir.Douglas Sirk, Starring Cornel Wilde, Patricia Knight

sources.title: Shockproof [1949] Dir.Douglas Sirk, Starring Cornel Wilde, Patricia Knight
sources.description: Shockproof is a 1949 American film noir directed by Douglas Sirk and starring Cornel Wilde and Patricia Knight. Wilde and Knight were husband and wife during filming. They divorced in 1951.
